name: Krishna Kosana
title: Senior QA Automation Engineer
professional_summary: I am having 5 years of experience in software testing with a focus on automation for contact center and IVR systems across healthcare, banking, and consulting domains.
I specialize in using Python and Java to automate tests for Amazon Connect and Cyara platforms, which helped ensure HIPAA compliant patient communication systems for healthcare clients.
I built automated test suites for IVR systems in banking, which actually reduced call center testing time and maintained PCI DSS compliance for financial transaction security.
I set up CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and Git to run automated tests, and it basically integrated Cyara results into QTest for better test management and reporting.
I wrote API tests with Postman and Java to validate backend services for contact centers, making sure data flows correctly between Amazon Connect and customer databases.
I figured out performance bottlenecks in IVR call flows using JMeter, then optimized the scripts to handle higher call volumes during peak banking hours.
I worked on integrating automated tests with QTest for test case management, and it helped our team track coverage for SOX audit requirements in consulting projects.
I created automation frameworks from scratch using Selenium and Python for web components of contact center agent desktops, which was a bit challenging but worked well.
I tested Amazon Connect contact flows and Lambda functions to ensure they met business rules, and I also helped fix issues related to call routing and queue management.
I stayed updated on testing trends by learning about behavior-driven development, and I applied those practices to improve collaboration between QA and development teams.

responsibilities: I work on automating tests for Amazon Connect contact flows that handle sensitive patient data, and I ensure all scripts comply with strict HIPAA regulations for healthcare communications.
I built automated Cyara test suites for IVR prescription refill systems, which validated voice prompts and DTMF inputs to prevent medication errors in patient interactions.
I use Python to script end-to-end tests for healthcare contact centers, and I integrated these tests with Jenkins pipelines for continuous deployment to AWS environments.
I created API tests with Postman to verify data exchange between Amazon Connect and EHR systems, making sure patient information remained accurate and secure.
I designed performance tests with JMeter to simulate high call volumes during flu season, and I identified bottlenecks in Lambda functions that process patient inquiries.
I set up QTest integration with our automation framework, and it helped manage test cases for FDA-regulated healthcare applications that required detailed audit trails.
I fixed flaky Selenium tests for the agent desktop portal, which involved debugging timing issues with dynamic healthcare forms that load patient history data.
I wrote Java scripts to test Amazon Connect Lambda functions that route calls based on clinical urgency, ensuring critical calls reached nurses within specified SLAs.
I collaborated with developers to implement behavior-driven development practices, and we used Gherkin to define test scenarios for new telehealth features on IVR.
I configured Jenkins jobs to run automated tests overnight, and I added Slack notifications to alert the team of any failures in production-like healthcare environments.
I updated our test automation framework to use Page Object Model design, which made test maintenance easier for the healthcare portal's frequently changing UI.
I documented test strategies for Amazon Connect implementations, focusing on disaster recovery scenarios to ensure patient communication channels remained operational.
I developed automated tests for banking IVR systems using Cyara, and I validated transaction flows for balance inquiries and fund transfers to ensure PCI DSS compliance.
I assembled a test automation framework with Java and Selenium for the bank's online contact center, which handled customer authentication and account management features.
I implemented API testing for backend services that integrated with Amazon Connect, verifying that customer data synchronized correctly between IVR and core banking systems.
I deployed automated test suites to Azure DevOps pipelines, and I scheduled them to run after each deployment to production banking environments for regression testing.
I produced detailed test reports in QTest for audit purposes, documenting how automated tests covered SOX controls related to financial transaction processing in IVR.
I assisted the performance testing team by creating JMeter scripts that simulated thousands of concurrent calls to the banking IVR during peak holiday seasons.
I utilized Postman collections to test REST APIs for customer profile management, ensuring data consistency across Amazon Connect, CRM, and banking databases.
I operationalized test automation for fraud detection IVR flows, where the system prompted customers to verify suspicious transactions through secure voice authentication.
I contributed to test planning sessions with business analysts, translating complex banking regulations into executable test cases for automated IVR validation.
I obtained certification in AWS solutions architecture to better understand the cloud infrastructure supporting our Amazon Connect implementation for the bank.
I designed test automation scripts for a consulting client's Dynamics 365 CRM integration with their contact center, using C# and Selenium to validate customer data flows.
I configured Power Automate flows to automate test data setup for consulting projects, which saved manual effort during UAT phases for client demonstrations.
I executed API tests with Postman for middleware services that connected IVR systems with backend databases, ensuring data accuracy for consulting reports.
I checked application logs in Azure Monitor to troubleshoot test failures, and I worked with developers to fix issues in the contact center's call routing logic.
I made test automation part of our consulting delivery process, showing clients how automated regression testing reduced risk during their digital transformation projects.
I put together training materials for junior team members on test automation basics, covering how to write maintainable test scripts for consulting engagements.
